SO. PERFECT.

Probably my favourite strip. I have shown this to women in order to demonstrate a difference between average women and average men in terms of what makes or breaks a relationship, with mixed results.

name: centipede_damascus
text: Roast Beef knows how to make a man stop looking at your breasts. That is probably the actual only way to do it unless you are willing to cut one or both of them off.

name: liquidcruelty
text:
No, I should think that would just make it so one could have them in a small box to view at one's leisure
but then the problem may be solved because they are debatably still -her- breasts if someone else has possession of them
this is not a productive area of discussion

name: gethen
text:
I first saw "That is probably the only way to do it unless you are willing to cut one."

And I thought, you know loud gas would work on about half... but it would completely encourage the other half.

name: boredom_man
text: I hope you do not honestly think that women who must have their breasts removed get less stares as a result.

name: matthearn
text: Does Beef routinely nap on the floor?  Or is he drunk?  Like, all by himself yes *exactly*?

name: robobogle
text: He's a cat.

name: lrosetw8
text:
That's what I was gonna say.

At first I was all "What's he doin' on the floor?", then I remembered that he was a cat.

name: gethen
text: but you do not see molly ever lying fetal on the floor, even at home.  When ray has, it's been because he has his slant on so hard he fell right over.  i have not seen the other cats display this behavior but now i will pay more attention.

name: nillsner
text: Its because the dude is hell of depressed. Molly and the other cats aren't depressed. Read a few more strips it'll all come together.

name: rowboat
text: Yeah, the guy who said that Beef is laying on the floor because "he's a cat" is not the one to listen to about this. If his answer is at all serious, I have to imagine that much of what makes this comic worth reading is probably lost on him. And if he's joking, well, it's a boring joke. Either way, trust nillsner and I.

name: lechatbotte
text: If it's just "He's a cat!" then he wouldn't be staring at an outlet. We've seen this behavior before in Beef, and it never comes from a happy place.

name: mygoodfriend
text: I hear monotreme and I go to echidnas, like, instantly. I feel strange.

Man I hate it when chicks get babies from my weiner

I'm all like COME ON WEINER THAT IS JUST DANG RUDE

name: bixschmix
text: Gunnysacks, man. Ain't fun but gets the job done.

name: spinynorman
text:
Probably the greatest "stupid guy thing" to say that I have ever heard happened at a party I was at. I was trying to fill up my cup when some guys right behind me started talking. I guess some hot chick walked in front of them, because one guy turned to the other and drunkenly slurred at the top of his lungs, " Man, I'd sure like to to put some babies in HER ass! "

I had to leave the room, I was laughing so hard. I can't believe the public school system failed that young man so badly.

name: boredom_man
text: He was mimicking O.D.B., actually.

name: tekende
text: ...Omar...the Dead Bagel...?

text:
Don't omar that bagel,
my friend.
Pass it over
to me.

name: xiaomimi
text:
Today's Blogs

Ray: Dinner with Tina.
Teodor: Jesus Philippe
Onstad: Some thoughts on my vacation to Kauai - pt II

name: i_love_kate
text:
I know that more often than not Teodor just comes off as Onstad parodying himself, but damnit all if he isn't the most hilarious blogger in the main.

(Note: I am sorry, Xiaomimi, if I keep clogging your inbox with these inane comments. It is because I have decided to read through the blogs at the same time as moving through the strip archives, which is incidentally a very fulfilling experience.)

Oh, and thanks again for making it so deliciously convenient!

name: dasuta
text: Beef seems to spend a lot of time reviewing that socket.

name: redmange
text: Him and that socket been through things man.  Things a guy and his socket shouldn't have to go through.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: you're bangin' a power socket but whatever. no cookies for you.

name: deliciousmuffin
text:
Is it wrong that I think the way Roast Beef is lying there is totally cute?

Also, my cat sleeps like that sometimes. I can only hope she doesn't have depression.

name: lowtrees
text: She does. Stop beating your cat. You've given your cat depression.

name: poodlelucy
text:
I thoroughly enjoy comics that forces me to look up words I am not familiar with. Who says the internet is a wasteland? Not this gal!

...and 1 for working monotreme into a functioning sentence.

name: mikestan
text: I often forget these are cats were watching and then I see Beef in this position and think immediately of my cat.  Fucking brilliant.

text: do you know beef is basically the worst person.

name: lolsworth
text:
Molly doesn't even bring up or react to the fact that Beef is curled up in the corner staring at the outlet through half-closed eyes. That's why she is perfect for him.

Of course, it could just be where he's a cat, and such as curling up in odd places is characteristic of cats.

name: admiral_klank
text: No one portrays depression as spot-on as Onstad.

name: johnnybaverage
text: We don't need to see Molly's face in the last panel. We know. We know.
